name: Oxygen Updater v4.2.0
body:
- **Added support for news article deep linking**
  This means that clicking on a news link (e.g. https://oxygenupdater.com/api/v2.5/news-content/115/EN) will open it in the app itself, instead of the browser
- **Added a long-press action to mark all news articles as read**
  Long-press on the unread count banner in the "News" tab.
- Improved download error handling for invalid download links
  (e.g. when OnePlus pulls/removes files from their OTA servers)
- Download link is now shown if MD5 verification fails
- Updated icons and colours to match OnePlus' new brand identity.
  See https://forums.oneplus.com/threads/deep-dive-a-look-into-our-new-brand-visual-identity.1201086/ and https://forums-images.oneplus.net/attachments/1260/1260743-f51b09eec9d7a879a914042a8aae8a89.jpg
- Updated default install guides text and images. This was long overdue, and would help when new devices are released (we won't have to edit install guides on admin portal as much anymore).
- Updated Finnish translations, thanks to @Jankku
- Updated Ukrainian translations, thanks to @uk-translations
- Updated Hungarian translations, thanks to @Obi33
- Updated Serbian translations, thanks to @mkusakovic

name: Oxygen Updater v4.1.0
body:
- **Added support for 8-series**
- **Fixed "couldn't move file to correct directory" error after download**
- Fixed news notifications being shown even if user has disabled them
- Fixed pixelated images and drawable tint issues on Lollipop devices (API 21 & 22)
- Fixed news and FAQ not loading on Lollipop devices, thanks to @arjanvlek
- Fixed slightly incorrect file sizes being shown (only for devices running Oreo and above)
- Fixed incorrect calculation of OkHttp cache quota size
- Added Hungarian translations, thanks to @Obi33
- Updated Dutch/Belgian translations, thanks to @AnonymousWP

name: Oxygen Updater v4.0.1
body:
- Fixed duplicated install guide pages
- Fixed rare crash while allocating disk space for a ZIP. Happened only on devices that didn't have enough space.
- Fixed bug while setting up cache for network requests
- Fixed rare crash in onboarding and install guide page
- Pressing the checkmark button in the onboarding screen now correctly starts the app, instead of going back one page
- Updated Ukrainian translations, thanks to @tarasyyyk
- Updated Dutch and Belgian translations, thanks to @AnonymousWP

name: Oxygen Updater v4.0.0
body:
This is the first release for our Kotlin rebuild. It comes with several under-the-hood improvements, as well as a major redesign throughout the app.

### Feature improvements
- If the user has selected a different device or update method, the "changelog" dialog will now show a small notice informing them about this
- If a download fails, the app now shows a download link, so that the user can manually download it via the browser
- The app now shows the MD5 hash of the update ZIP, below the file name
- Greatly improved UI/UX for server banners - they're now behind a BottomSheet, that's shown after the user taps on it. Thus, it frees up space on the main update page.
- WebViews within the app now have improved error handling, and do not show a blank white screen on first load anymore
- Added a loading shimmer animation in many views
- Switched to Google Sans for several title/header TextViews
- Several TextViews are now selectable
- Added a statistical banner in NewsFragment, that shows the number of unread articles. This is coupled with a badge that's displayed on the "News" tab. Tapping on this banner toggles between showing only unread articles, and all articles.
- Added error/empty states to convey useful information to the user
- Moved to Retrofit for network requests, and Glide for image requests
- Updated Italian translations, thanks to @Rithari
- Updated Serbian translations, thanks to @mkusakovic

### Support for in-app updates
This version (and higher) support Google Play's in-app updates feature - meaning the user won't have to open Play Store to update the app, they can do so from within the app itself.
Currently, the app checks for an update once every 2 days, and the user can choose to accept or reject an update via the dialog shown by Play Services. In case an update is rejected 7 times, or if the update is 14 days old, the app shows a fullscreen UI (again, served by Play Services) to inform the user that this is an "important" update, and should be installed.


### Redesign
Additionally, major redesigns were done:
- News article page
- Install guide page (for both rooted and non-rooted devices)
- Setup/onboarding page
- About this app page
- Most dialogs were switched to BottomSheets instead, as it offers better UX

### Brand identity
The main goal of the redesign was to refresh everything upto modern standards, and conform to our "brand identity". The previous UI/UX of the app looked unpolished, unprofessional, etc.
As part of this redesign, we updated app logo and other icons to their "rounded" variants. Rounder icons convey a sense of friendliness, reliability, safety, etc. Since this app is made by the community, for the community, it should reflect the same personality/character traits of that community - friendly, supportive, dependable.
If you're a UX designer, you'd probably understand this change right away - if not, check out this article: https://uxplanet.org/rounded-or-sharp-corner-buttons-def3977ed7c4.

name: Oxygen Updater v3.8.0
body:
- Primarily a hotfix for improving differentiation between EU and global builds. See PR #100
- Added Serbian translations, thanks to @mkusakovic
- Updated Ukrainian translations, thanks to @tarasyyyk
- Updated French translations, thanks to @KB4284848

name: Oxygen Updater v3.7.0
body:
- Significantly improved error messages for unsupported devices
- Added Ukrainian translations, thanks to @tarasyyyk
- Updated Swedish translations, thanks to @loidsemus
- Updated Dutch & Flemish translations, thanks to @Iodu

name: Oxygen Updater v3.6.0
body:
- Added Arabic translations, thanks to @MooDeeY
- Added Polish translations, thanks to @Adiker
- Fixed the empty space issue at the bottom of the screen for ad-free users
- Greatly reduced app size (almost 30% reduction)

name: Oxygen Updater v3.5.1
body: - Fixed an issue where the bottom banner ad was hiding important UI elements

name: Oxygen Updater v3.5.0
body:
- We've added support for OnePlus 7T-series!
- Added Danish translations, thanks to Knud Kj√∏lhede Petersen
- Updated Finnish translations, thanks to @Jankku 
- Updated French translations, thanks to @julroy67 
- Updated dependencies

name: Oxygen Updater v3.4.0
body:
- Added Turkish translations, thanks to @Demirbx
- Updated Chinese and Finnish translations, thanks to @Asstiff and @zazuu0

name: Oxygen Updater v3.3.0
body:
- Added Japanese translations, thanks to @yoshi818 
- Updated Chinese translations, thanks to @Asstiff 
- Updated Dutch and Belgium translations, thanks to @AnonymousWP 
- Updated dependencies

name: Oxygen Updater v3.2.0
body:
- Added support for adaptive icons
- Added Thai translations, thanks to Tanatus Kalapaha
- Updated Chinese translations, thanks to @Asstiff 
- Updated Dutch & Belgian translations, thanks to @AnonymousWP 
- Fixed rare crash while starting the app

name: Oxygen Updater v3.1.0
body:
- Fixed rare crash while opening Settings
- Fixed video playback in news
- Fixed a layout issue with banner ads
- Minor UI tweaks

name: Oxygen Updater v3.0.2
body:
- Added spanish translations, thanks to @Ismael034
- New launcher icon - let us know if you like it!

name: Oxygen Updater v3.0.1
body:
- Fixed a bug that caused the app to crash for a few users when they opened Settings
- Fixed a minor UI/UX issue in old devices
- Thank you to everyone who tested these fixes before we released it to everyone!

name: Oxygen Updater v3.0.0
body:
- First release under new team
- App has been redesigned, including a dark theme! Supports Android Q‚Äôs automatic night mode, as well as OnePlus‚Äô System theme setting in Display -> Theme
- Improved performance of the app, so it should feel smoother than before
- Icons have been redesigned as vectors
- Updated all dependencies to the latest version, which means more security and stability for you
- Because of the redesign, some translations are being re-done by the community

name: Oxygen Updater v2.7.6
body:
- The app has been translated into Chinese (simplified). Thanks to @Asstiff for making the translation!
- The section about helping to improve the app has been translated into various other languages
- Improved the explanation about the difference between full and incremental updates (on the settings screen)

name: Oxygen Updater v2.7.3
body: This update adds support for the all-new OnePlus 7 Pro series

name: Oxygen Updater v2.7.4
body:
This update fixes several bugs in the app:
- Fixed critical crash when the download size of an update is larger than 2047 MB
- Fixed crash in handling of download errors
- Fixed crashes upon receiving data from the server when the app was already exited

name: Oxygen Updater v2.7.5
body:
- The app now supports the 5G edition of the OnePlus 7 Pro
- The app is prepared to support the non-Pro OnePlus 7 when it launches

name: Oxygen Updater v2.7.2
body: Fixed the ‚ÄúContribute‚Äù popup appearing every time for users who‚Äôve updated the app from version 2.6.3 or before, but choose not to contribute

name: Oxygen Updater v2.5.0
body:
This update is a feature release:
- The app is now available in French, German and Finnish. Thanks to everybody who helped translating the project!
- The is now optimized for Android Pie (9.0)
- Fixed crash when download error popup was trying to be opened when you had already closed the app
- This update does *NOT* fix the issues with new updates being unavailable in the app. This is being worked on and a (possible) fix for it lies outside of the app itself.

name: Oxygen Updater v2.6.1
body: Bug and crash fixes

name: Oxygen Updater v2.6.2
body: Fix for download sometimes getting corrupt

name: Oxygen Updater v2.6.3
body: Added more logging to download errors to help diagnosing remaining issues

name: Oxygen Updater v2.7.1
body: Reduced the amount of ‚ÄúThank you for contributing‚Äù messages.

name: Oxygen Updater v2.7.0
body:
- You can now help improve the app by sending details of new update files present on your phone. Sign up and start helping today!
- The app has been translated into Swedish (thanks to @UnTubular)
- The app now supports automatic update installations on rooted OnePlus 6 / 6T with TWRP 3.3.0-0 and up.
- Logs are now stored on Firebase instead of the app servers. If you don‚Äôt want this, turn off the option "Share usage data and logs" in the app‚Äôs settings.

name: Oxygen Updater v2.6.0
body:
This is a big update to Oxygen Updater!
- Added pause & resume support for downloads
- (Hopefully) fixed the "Download failed and needs to be restarted"  error
- Added Croatian translation (thanks to Republic for translating)
- Known issue: Some download errors are not translated to Russian & Italian

name: Oxygen Updater v2.5.3
body:
- Improved support for news posts with external images and videos
- Fixed typo in the French translation
- Fixed crash on launch which impacted a small group of users

name: Oxygen Updater v2.5.2
body:
Version 2.5.2:
- The app is now available in Italian. Thanks to @Rithari for making the translation!
- Fixed possible network error when downloading on Android P and up. This is not a fix for the ‚Äúdownload failed and needs to be restarted‚Äù error.
- New updates are now submitted with help of the community. This may take slightly longer than before but expect most updates to be available in the app quickly. Thanks to all contributors who help make this possible!
